-Lady Hawk listened intently, it was possible to teach a bot when 
it's programming is new, but it was to hard to teach a new bot old 
tricks. "Right now there are still two main programmings, Maximal and 
Predacon. What if we were to combine the two? Not just combine 
animals but combine programming too." Squizzy was smart enough to 
know when ideas were right or wrong. She could be just the bot 
Veratis would need to help achieve his goals. "After all" She 
continued "Didn't the profecy say Till all are one?"

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Squizzy::
> 
> She nodded. "I agree, It's not the just the body, but the mind of 
the 
> bot that needs to be nature oriented. But then, how do we do this? 
> You can give a bot a body, but a mind?" She shook her head. 
> "Something about that..I don't like.  If I had found out that you 
had 
> made me, created my to be perfect in body, I would be gratefull and 
> show great loyalty.  But if I found that you made my mind to think 
> tha way that you programmed, that my thoughts were not truely my 
own, 
> I'd go balistic.  No,  There has to be another way."  She thought, 
> then her eyes lit up as the idea ran across her mind,"THAT'S IT!"  
we 
> don't program it. We teach it.  Give the bot the body of the 
perfect 
> warrior,but the innocent mind of a child.  Then we teach it was we 
> want it to know.  Then it will grow and learn on it's own, not just 
> obey a program. but we can program it to be open minded, show 
> tenancies to be caring, wanting to learn, appreciate learning and 
> scientific learning."  She was smiling really hard at this. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
